about_the_game:
A Daughter Raising Sim/RPG

You are a guardian tasked with raising your daughter from pre-teen to adulthood. You will set her budget and assign her work each week. You will also adventure with her across the continent and discover it's hidden secrets. Your choices will decide the type of person she grows to become.

Daughter Raising Sim?

There are many aspects to raising your daughter in Guardian's Guide. You will choose her Personality Traits, day jobs, and the budget (food, health and life items) she will use each week. This will allow you to balance her Condition and Mood. Almost every activity in the game will effects her Condition and Mood. It is your job to make the correct choices to keep your daughter happy and healthy.

RPG?

You will explore the continent with your daughter as she adventures across new territory. Recruit over 50 beast companions to assist her on her 8 year journey. Equip your daughter and companions with an expansive list of weapons, outfits, rings, necklaces, jewels, talents, and skills. Explore 5 distinct regions, each with several maps providing engaging and interactive quests. Test your daughter's might in the yearly Coliseum Tournament and win fabulous prizes.

Story

Enjoy unique events with your daughter's employers and experience events and story quest spanning across several years that will unravel a nation wide epic. Participate in the local yearly events such as Summer Festival and Tribute. These events host mini-games, limited time items, and unique interactions with your daughter and characters in the game world.

Feature List

  • Daughter Raising Sim with 11 Unique Paths to discover
  • Daughter Ages from 11-18, each with a Unique Illustration
  • Nearly 1,000 in total distinct items, equipment, skills, and talents in the game
  • Choose from 22 Personality Traits that will determine her fate and how she response to many interactions in the game
  • Choose from a list of 12 Jobs to work each week, these jobs will help build her core stats and help fund her growth
  • Experience the lives of the residence of the game as your daughter grows over the years
  • Shop, Play and Experience multiple events/mini games throughout each year of the game world
  • Your daughter will explore the continent while completing over 100 quests as a Guild member
  • Choose from a list of over 50 beast to join your party, each with a distinct skill and talent
  • High quality artwork that supports up to 4k resolution, fully animated illustrations and backgrounds
  • Xbox360 Controller Support

name: Guardian's Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window's 10, Window's 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 M/ Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
